Entered text from ed. with english trans. Remaining issues: Line 7: ed. had a question mark after â€œnameâ€ in the lacuna: I could not figure out how to add this. // Line 8: I did not correct to "Arsinoitou" as per ed., as this gave a more than usually false impression of the lacunae in the line for little orthographic benefit.// Lines 9-10, 13-14: There were corrections and regularizations of words that crossed over lines, and I could not figure out how to manipulate the display such that it preserved regular formatting.// Line 14: corrected editorial abbreviation by removing periods in original editions for â€œnom.â€ and â€œker.â€.
